item.description:
The book club is open to all members. The next book will be The Dovekeepers by Alice Hoffman. This new book has been described as her best. It is set in Masada in 70 BCE and chronicles the lives of some women who were there during the Roman siege.

We will be meeting Saturday, January 26 at Ellen Abelson's house. The address will be sent to those who sign up. Please join us for this book
item.name: Next Bookclub
